page.title: 07RECREATION IN OWERMOIGNE
page.content: OWERMOIGNE HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY CATERS FOR THE INTERESTS OF OUR INHABITANTS,WHOSE{OVERWHELMING}LEISURE ACTIVITY IS{GARDENING AND THE {ASSOCIATED FLOWER ARRANGING AND {BEE-KEEPING.WALKING,KNITTING,SEWING,DO {-IT-YOURSELF AND MUSIC ARE POPULAR.} SOCIETIES INCLUDE{WOMENS} {INSTITUTE,BINGO,YOGA,KEEP FIT {MOTHER/TODDLER GROUP, PLAYGROUP, {CHURCH YOUTH GROUP, TEENAGE CLUB AND {SUNDAY SCHOOL.LOCAL CHILDREN ATTEND {BROWNIES,CUBS,YOUTH CENTRE,SWIMMING {AND BALLET LESSONS AND MAJORETTES IN DORCHESTER,WAREHAM,WEYMOUTH AND CROSSWAYS.THERE IS A HALL WITH A STAGE.THERE IS A PLAYING FIELD BUT THERE ARE CALLS FOR MORE YOUTH FACILITIES.THE VILLAGE IS NOT ALLOWED A PUB BY ITS LAND-OWNERS,THE CREE FAMILY,BUT ALL LOCALS MAY BE MEMBERS OF THE CRICKET CLUB AND USE ITS BAR.
